SENT.plain: We developed a small animal embolic stroke model for pharmacological screening trials
Microspheres are injected into the carotid circulations and group embolus dose-response relationships are calculated
Emboli quantity is related to neurologic injury, and small changes in neurologic function are detectable
Rabbits tolerated twice as many microspheres when cyproheptadine-treated after embolization
This demonstrated both the sensitivity of the model and the value of serotonin antagonists in reducing neurological injury
